func_sig.description: Calculate and return all angles of a pentagon based on angle relationships.
func_sig.name: calculate_pentagon_angle_measurements

angles.description: A dictionary containing the measures of angles A, B and additional_angle.

func_sig.description: Evaluate arithmetic or mathematical expressions provided as strings.
func_sig.name: evaluate_expression

func_sig.description: Calculate the result of a fractional arithmetic expression.
func_sig.name: calculate_fractional_expression

func_sig.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given its base and height.
func_sig.name: calculate_area_of_triangle

base.description: The length of the base of the triangle.

func_sig.description: Calculate the perpendicular distance to a line given two points.
func_sig.name: calculate_perpendicular_distance

func_sig.description: Calculate the probability based on favorable outcomes and total outcomes.
func_sig.name: calculate_probability

output_fraction.description: Indicate whether the output should be in fractional form.

func_sig.description: Calculate and return all angles of a polygon based on given angle relationships.
func_sig.name: calculate_polygon_angle_measurements

angles.description: A dictionary containing the measures of angles in the polygon.
